Text:
I played this game a lot back on my pentium 100 comp. Tried to play it agian few years ago, but as u said "no sound" . It just sucks to play with no sound. Tried a lot of things to make the sound works on dosbox, but I didnt manage to :(
Anyway congratulations for uploading such great classic game.

I agree, eventhough the sounds were mediocre, it's still too bad it wont work.  However, it doesnt bother me all that much, I just put in a cd and listen to some music.
 I have that problem with a lot of old games, I've actually been thinking of digging up an old 486 somewhere lol.
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/3950003/primitive_wars this is the sequel. Grab jurassic war from abandonia with no need for seeders.
